trigger_event: On every `git push` to a feature branch
success_criteria: Linter passes. Unit test coverage >= 80% (REQ-1-072). All unit tests pass. SAST scan finds no new critical/high vulnerabilities.
failure_action: Block pull request merge. Notify author via GitHub Actions.
escalation_procedure: PR cannot be merged until fixed.
business_impact: Prevents defects and security flaws at the earliest possible stage.

success_criteria: All integration tests (including security rules) pass 100%. Automated smoke test suite (critical path E2E) passes 100%. Deployment to Staging is successful.
failure_action: Block deployment. Rollback if necessary. Create P1 bug and notify team.
tools_used: GitHub Actions, Firebase Emulator Suite, Flutter integration_test
business_impact: Ensures the staging environment is stable for UAT and exploratory testing.

trigger_event: Manual trigger for release to production
success_criteria: All automated E2E regression tests pass. UAT has been signed off by Product Owner. Performance benchmarks met in pre-prod environment. No open P1/P2 bugs for the release scope. DR drill completed in the last quarter.
failure_action: Abort production release. Schedule emergency planning meeting.
responsible_team: Release Manager, QA Lead, Product Owner
business_impact: Prevents critical defects and performance regressions from reaching end-users.
